T02D3297:39b-1: badzra b'a r'a h'i s'a dha nam /
T02D3297:39b-3: rdo rje phag mo'i sgrub thabs /
T02D3297:39b-4: bcom ldan 'das 'phags ma rdo rje phag mo la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3297:40a-0: @40a * // de nas de'i phyir na bcom ldan 'das ma gsang
T02D3297:40a-1: ba'i dbang phyug ma lha dang bcas pa rnams kyi
T02D3297:40a-3: shin tu che ba'i gsang chen ma //
T02D3297:40a-4: lha mo chen mo dbang phyug che //
T02D3297:40a-7: gsad ba zhes bya'i yum 'di ni //
T02D3297:40a-8: sgyu ma chen mo zhes rnam grags //
T02D3297:40a-9: rig ma 'jig rten gsum skrag ma //
T02D3297:40a-10: dbang phyug chen mo rab 'jigs ma //
T02D3297:40a-11: rig pa gang zhig shes tsam gyis //
T02D3297:40a-12: sgrub pa po yi dbang phyug gis //
T02D3297:40a-13: lhar bcas dri za'i tshogs rnams dang //
T02D3297:40a-14: lha min mi dang gnod sbyin bcas //
T02D3297:40a-15: rig 'dzin sha za srin po dang //
T02D3297:40a-17: 'byung po rnams kyang dbang du byed //
T02D3297:40a-18: chu las skyes dang thang skyes kyi //
T02D3297:40a-19: rig pas ngo mtshar cher byed yin //
T02D3297:40a-20: de bzhin mig 'phrul byed pa dang //
T02D3297:40a-21: rmongs dang rengs pa nyid dang ni //
T02D3297:40a-22: rnam par dbye dang bskrad sogs dang //
T02D3297:40a-23: dbang dang dgug dang rmongs bya dang //
T02D3297:40a-24: ya mtshan rnam pa mang po rnams //
T02D3297:40a-25: rig pa bklags pa tsam gyis byed //
T02D3297:40a-26: sgrung pa po yis bklags bsgrub kyis //
T02D3297:40a-27: bzlas pa dang ni bsrung sdom dang //
T02D3297:40a-28: de la smyung gnas med par brjod //
T02D3297:40a-30: lha mo ngas ni bden par smras //
T02D3297:40a-31: 'jig rten gsum kun sgrub byed pa'i //
T02D3297:40a-32: sgyu ma chen po khyod kyi sngags //
T02D3297:40a-33: lha rdzas yi ge'i phreng ba yis //
T02D3297:40a-35: aom bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje phag mo la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3297:40a-36: 'phags ma gzhan gyis mi thub ma 'jig rten gsum gyi rig pa chen mo //
T02D3297:40a-37: 'byung bo thams cad kyi 'jigs pa sel bar mdzad ma /
T02D3297:40a-38: rdo rje chen mo rdo rje'i gdan ma /
T02D3297:40a-39: mi thub ma gzhan gyis mi thub ma /
T02D3297:40a-40: dbang du mdzad ma mig 'phrul bar mdzad ma /
T02D3297:40a-42: khros ma khro mo mche ba gtsigs ma /
T02D3297:40a-43: kun du skrag par mdzad ma gsod mdzad ma /
T02D3297:40a-45: gzhan las rnam par rgyal ma /
T02D3297:40a-47: rmugs par mdzod cig / rengs par mdzod cig /
T02D3297:40a-48: rmongs par mdzod cig / rdo rje phag mo rnal
T02D3297:40b-0: 'byor ma chen @40b mo 'dod pa'i dbang phyug che
T02D3297:40b-2: pro tam ge pr'a ge pr'a t'a na ki na
T02D3297:40b-3: ki ni kee khi ni h'um na dhu na rdo
T02D3297:40b-5: kha tv'am ga dang thod pa bsnams ma chen mo
T02D3297:40b-6: gsol bar mdzad pa'i sha gsol ma mi'i rgyu ma
T02D3297:40b-7: legs par gon pa la brgyus pa'i mi'i mgo bo
T02D3297:40b-8: kun nas zum pa'i phreng ba dang ldan ma //
T02D3297:40b-9: sumbha ni sumbhe ha na ha na pr'a n'a na
T02D3297:40b-10: sdig pa dang sems can rnams thams cad kyi dbang
T02D3297:40b-11: phyug rnams thams cad kyi sha chod cig / khros
T02D3297:40b-12: par gyur pa'i sku mche ba rnam par gtsigs ma
T02D3297:40b-13: / phyag rgya chen mo dpal he ru ka'i lha'i
T02D3297:40b-14: btsun mo dam pa rnams kyi mchog dbu stong phrag
T02D3297:40b-16: zhal stong phrag brgya mnga' ma 'bar ba'i gzi brjid can zhal 'bar ma spyan ser ma /
T02D3297:40b-18: mi li mi li ti mi li ti mi he
T02D3297:40b-19: he h'um h'um kha kha dhu dhu dhu ru dhu
T02D3297:40b-20: ru su ru mu ru gnyis su med pa'i rnal
T02D3297:40b-21: 'byor ma chen mo bklags pas grub ma drem dhom
T02D3297:40b-22: drem dhom gram gram he he ha ha 'jigs mdzad
T02D3297:40b-23: ma ha sa ha sa dpa' mo ha ha ho
T02D3297:40b-24: ho h'um h'um / 'jig rten gsum rnam par 'joms par mdzad ma /
T02D3297:40b-25: de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba phrag 'gum gyis yongs su bskor ma h'um phat /
T02D3297:40b-27: kha: glang po che'i sku ma /
T02D3297:40b-28: ga: 'jig rten gsum gsus par chud ma /
T02D3297:40b-29: rgya mtsho chan mo rked kar slebs ma /
T02D3297:40b-30: gra sa gra sa h'um h'um phat /
T02D3297:40b-31: dpa' mo dang gnyis su med na /
T02D3297:40b-32: h'um h'um h'a h'a phyug chen po rnams rmongs par mdzad pa'i rnal 'byor ma'i dbang phyug ma khyod /
T02D3297:40b-33: mkha' 'gro ma'i 'jig rten ma rnams kyis phyag byas ma /
T02D3297:40b-34: 'phral la yid ches par mdzad ma h'um phat /
T02D3297:40b-35: 'byung po rnams skrag par mdzad ma /
T02D3297:40b-36: dpa' mo chen mo mchog tu grub ma rig pa'i dbang phyug ma phat /
T02D3297:40b-37: h'um h'um phat h'um h'um phat sv'a h'a /
T02D3297:40b-38: bcom ldan 'das ma sgyu ma chen po 'di ni bklags pa tsam gyis 'grub pa yin no //
T02D3297:40b-39: 'di sgrub thabs su gyur pa ni zla ba gzas zin pa na aang rung ste /
T02D3297:40b-40: gzas gzung ba la blta zhing lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas par bya ba'o //
T02D3297:40b-42: ji srid du bzlas pa byed pha de srid du bud med stong rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ro //
T02D3297:40b-43: lan cig brjod pas 'gugs par byed do //
T02D3297:40b-44: khro bo'i sems kyis ni gsod par byed do//
T02D3297:41a-0: @41a * // bskrad bya dbye dang rengs par bya ba yang 'dod pa'i dbang gis byed par 'gyur ba yin /
T02D3297:41a-1: me tog la lan cig bsngags nas nam mkha' la
T02D3297:41a-2: 'phangs pas tshangs pa la sogs pa rnams mthong bar
T02D3297:41a-3: 'gyur ro // dur khrod kyi sol ba la lan cig bsngags nas khyim mam grong ngam /
T02D3297:41a-4: grong khyer la btab pa tshig par mthong bar 'gyur ro //
T02D3297:41a-5: rma bya'i mjug sgro la lan cig bsngags nas nam
T02D3297:41a-6: mkha' la byugs pas slar yang nye bar zhi bar
T02D3297:41a-7: 'gyur ro // gram gseg la lan cig bsngags nas
T02D3297:41a-8: phyogs bzhir btor [*gtor?] bas dpung gi tshogs yan lag
T02D3297:41a-10: rma bya'i mjug sgro phyin ci log tu bskor bas mthong ba phyir bzlog par 'gyur ro //
